FuncDef: The mbs-contribution override command within the SAP ingress and egress contexts is used to override a parent policer s priority level s mbs-contribution parameter that is defined within the policer-control-policy applied to the SAP. This override allow the priority level s burst tolerance to be tuned based on the needs of the SAP s child policers attached to the priority level.

ParaDef.Info: Signifies that size is expressed in bytes.
Signifies that the size is expressed in kilobytes. Values-0 - 16777216 or default.
